summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Top War Moderator Application system. Both backend APIs and frontend UI are fully functional with excellent integration. All core features working: application submission, moderator authentication, dashboard management, search, and approval/rejection workflows.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of expected 401 for unauthorized access
minor_issues.impact: Very minor - both status codes indicate unauthorized access correctly

minor_observations.issue: Found 23 form inputs instead of expected 20
minor_observations.impact: No functional impact - all 20 questions are present and working

passed_tests: Landing page loads with working navigation buttons
Search functionality by name, Discord, in-game name, server
Application detail view shows all responses
